short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cyberpunk 2077 Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Cyberpunk 2077 background. Cyberpunk 2077 wallpaper themes for game fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Rotate through a variety of Cyberpunk 2077 wallpapers each time a new tab is opened.
2. Select or favorite Cyberpunk 2077 backgrounds in the wallpaper customization panel.
3. Integrated search bar powered by Google.
4. Convenient links to email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature for jotting down tasks and reminders.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarked pages.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing favorite sites quickly.
10. Direct links to Google applications.
11. Explore more themes with easy access.
12. Streamlined sharing to social media.
13. Instant download options for new wallpapers.
14. Quick links to online gaming.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on your Cyberpunk 2077 themed tab.
